mapper.insert: insert into smstform (mebrNO, id, registCode, title, lastPrice, status, level, levelDetail, attdPps, attdPath, intro, expect) values (#{mebrNO}, #{id}, #{registCode}, #{title}, #{lastPrice}, #{status}, #{level}, #{levelDetail}, #{attdPps}, #{attdPath}, #{intro}, #{expect})
